column1: Average Rating (Kantō): 14.4{{Episode list| EpisodeNumber = SP| Title = The Devil Whispers to a Tragedy-stricken Couple: Behind the Death of an OB/GYN doctor, the 14-year-old Murder Case of a Woman and Organ Trade: A Father's Time-transcending Prayer, a Mother's Regret: When the Truth Is Revealed, the Ultimate Cold Case and a Death in the Line of Duty!?| AltTitle = Higeki no Fuufu ni Akuma no Sasayaki: Sanfujinka Ishi no Shi no Ura ni Juuyonenmae no Josei Satsujin Jiken to Zouki Baibai: Toki o Koeta Chichi no Inori to Haha no Koukai: Shinjitsu o Shiru Toki, Saidai no Mikaiketsu to Shougeki no Junshoku ga!?| RAltTitle =  ({{Nihongo2|悲劇の夫婦に悪魔の囁き～産婦人科医師の死の裏に14年前の女性殺人事件と臓器売買～時を越えた父の祈りと母の後悔～真実を知る時、最大の未解決と衝撃の殉職が!?}})| RTitle = | DirectedBy = Shōsuke Murayama| WrittenBy = Masaaki Sakai| OriginalAirDate = {{Start date|2011|7|8}}| Aux4 = 13.9| TopColor = F2F2F2}}
